fields.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

This is the invoice eligibility rule Instance unique identifier.
The unique name of the invoice eligibility rule.
When true,  Workday includes customer invoice adjustments in the invoice eligibility rule.
When true,  Workday includes supplier invoice adjustments in the invoice eligibility rule.
The types of customer invoices associated with the invoice eligibility rule. When the value is blank, the eligibility rule retrieves all customer invoice types.
The number of days invoices must be open for Workday to include them in the netting process.

Customer_Invoice_Types_Reference.description: The types of customer invoices associated with the invoice eligibility rule. When the value is blank, the eligibility rule retrieves all customer invoice types.

Include_Customer_Invoice_Adjustments.description: When true,  Workday includes customer invoice adjustments in the invoice eligibility rule.

Include_Supplier_Invoice_Adjustments.description: When true,  Workday includes supplier invoice adjustments in the invoice eligibility rule.
